article: as caroline kennedy embarked on a tour of upstate new york this week , camera crews and reporters in tow , the state 's attorney general , andrew m. cuomo , was announcing a $ #.# million settlement with the operator of an illegal dump in lackawanna .
abstract: quiet strategy for a senate seat ties cuomo s hands nicholas confessore contributed reporting
